column1: So glad to hear VP @JoeBiden has tested negative for COVID. Please stay safe and healthy! But let’s not stop let’s get this done. We need your leadership.
As Biden talks to those who lost someone to COVID Trump interrupts because he has no clue how to be compassionate. And show any empathy.

CA nurses risk their lives everyday to save lives #COVID19. They must be given staffing & resources to do their jobs.  @HCAhealthcare got billions - that $ must be used for nurses & patients. Do the right thing protect nurses & save lives. #SupportHealthCareHeroes @SEIU121RN

Love this! Thank you for supporting your wife and our healthcare workers as they fight to save lives. I can relate my sister is a RN at a Colorado hospital. I will continue to fight (& pray) for our healthcare workers first responders and those on the frontlines #COVID19 https://t.co/uz8dy9WYTq

Thank you to our healthcare workers including my RN big sis! These stories are heartbreaking & unacceptable. We must protect them by giving them the tools they need. & Help by staying home and staying healthy #COVID19. Nurses Share Coronavirus Stories  https://t.co/o4megQecoL
